4. **"for the"**: This preposition does not correspond to any cell in the table, as it is a grammatical element and not a noun form.

5. **"you two"**: The word "you" in the genitive case corresponds to "ngipen," which is found in row 1 of the table under the genitive case column. The word "two" does not have its own cell but modifies the noun "you."

6. **"ngipeniya"**: This term refers to "you and i" (dual) in the dual case, located in row 4 of the table under the dual case column.
